articles.title: Ukraine war: Briton killed while volunteering in Ukraine, says sister
articles.description: Craig Mackintosh, from Norfolk, died last week and his sister is fundraising to bring his body home.
articles.content:
A British man has been killed while volunteering as a medic in Ukraine, his sister has said.
Craig Mackintosh, from Thetford, Norfolk, died "in the line of duty" on 24 August, Lorna Mackintosh said.… [+1155 chars]

articles.title: Sarah Palin loses election to represent Alaska in Congress
articles.description: Democrat Mary Peltola will become the first Native American to represent Alaska in Congress.
articles.content: Ms Palin, 58, rose to prominence as a vice-presidential candidate in 2008. She has since become a key Trump ally.
